data.chText: 许多老年人生活于贫困之中。
data.enText: Many elderly people live in poverty .
a lack of sth; poor quality
There is a poverty of colour in her work.

tr: the state of having little or no money and few or no material possessions

value.def: Poverty is the state of being extremely poor.

example.ex: According to World Bank figures, 41 per cent of Brazilians live in absolute poverty...
example.tran: 根据世界银行的统计数字，41%的巴西人生活在赤贫中。

example.ex: Garvey died in loneliness and poverty.
example.tran: 加维在孤独和穷困中死去。

value.def: You can use poverty to refer to any situation in which there is not enough of something or its quality is poor.

example.ex: Britain has suffered from a poverty of ambition.
example.tran: 英国一直缺乏远大理想。

trans: 减少贫困；减贫；减轻贫困；降低贫困；消除贫困
贫困指数；指标为贫困指数；贫穷指数
